reasoning: Drug-resistant HIV develops in untreated or poorly adherent patients (~10-15% annually). With ~40 million living with HIV globally, estimated ~12-15 per 100k person-years. WHO surveillance data shows increasing resistance in resource-limited settings.
source: WHO HIV Drug Resistance Fact Sheet (2005) and Bennett DE et al. (2004). The World Health Organization's Global Strategy for Prevention and Assessment of HIV Drug Resistance. Antivir Ther. 9(2):1-25
